## Field.doClassValidation\_() method

Used to validate a value. Returns input by default. Can be overridden by subclasses, see FieldDropdown.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected doClassValidation_(opt_newValue?: any): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_newValue | any | <i>(Optional)</i> The value to be validated. |

<b>Returns:</b>

any

The validated value, same as input by default.
